body_html:
If you just want to see the \'{i} rendered, make a file test.tex with the following code:

\documentclass[border=1pt]{standalone}

\begin{document}
  Mart\'{i}n
\end{document}

Then compile this, e.g. using pdflatex with the command pdflatex test.tex. This will generate a PDF, which contains the rendered result.

If you have no system with LaTeX installed, try out this online LaTeX previewer.
